content.text:
# Markdown Bug

That looks like a bug to me. How do we squash it?

## Source

```md
[Cannabis in Georgia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cannabis_in_Georgia_(country))
```

## Expected

> [Cannabis in Georgia][1]

## Actual

> [Cannabis in Georgia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cannabis_in_Georgia_(country))


## ???

I'm seeing this in Patchbay, but I'm going to check Patchwork too.

[1]: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cannabis_in_Georgia_(country)
